__e: Freddy worked on the girl, got her to drop the charges and to say she lied.
Freddy came into my dream last night.
Freddy bought a case of champagne. I checked with the liquor store. It was on the same day that he made the 11th call to you.
This is impossible for me to believe that I'm standing here, and Freddy's in this padded box.
That's a blow-up of a fingerprint that was made at Freddy's studio. And I'm afraid, sir... It places you there on the night of his death.
You're tired of your home. You're tired of Windy Corner. And you're tired of Freddy and me.
My name is Freddy, as you well know!
